featuredTrack.title: Found Sounds
featuredTrack.description: The closer. Discovering music in unexpected places. Every ending is a beginning.

dailyQuote.text: The most beautiful sounds come from broken things learning to sing again.
dailyQuote.author: Vesper Sinclair

news.title: Featured Track: Found Sounds
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'Found Sounds' - track 12 from our album. The closer. Discovering music in unexpected places. Every ending is a beginning.

news.title: Featured Track: No Geography
news.content: Track 09: 'No Geography' - Borderless sound. Music that exists everywhere and nowhere.

news.title: Album Now Streaming Everywhere
news.content: Our debut album 'Euphoric Wreckage' is now available on all major streaming platforms. 12 tracks of dark euphoric breakbeat ready for your ears.
